name: diablo 3-13
description:
Popular student's card game Diablo. It is called The gin rummy in US. Or Rummy gyn. I don't know - I have never been in US

4 players and 54 cards.
You play against 3 experts of this game. Try to win them.
Just collect combinations of 3 and more cards.

Every day you can get World Top and be number 1.

Also you can learn your children to play this game and be free from parent duty.
